is_upload.title: Is Upload
is_upload.description: Let the R4M api know if this sdk request is coming from a file upload within your environment (for analytics)

rt.title: Round Trip
rt.description: The tour type of this route. rt is short for round trip, the optimization engine changes its behavior for round trip routes

disable_optimization.title: Disable Optimization
disable_optimization.description: By disabling optimization, the route optimization engine will not resequence the stops in your

route_name.title: Route Name
route_name.description: The name of this route. this route name will be accessible in the search API, and also will be displayed on the mobile device of a user

route_date.title: Route Date
route_date.description: The route start date in UTC, unix timestamp seconds. Used to show users when the route will begin, also used for reporting and analytics

route_time.title: Route Time
route_time.description: Time when the route starts (relative to route_date) (Seconds). UTC timezone as well

shared_publicly.title: Shared Publicly
shared_publicly.description: Deprecated. Specify if the route can be viewed by unauthenticated users

optimize.title: Optimize
optimize.description: The driving directions will be generated biased for this selection. This has no impact on route sequencing

lock_last.title: Lock Last
lock_last.description: A flag to indicate if the last stop in the route should be fixed

vehicle_capacity.title: Vehicle Capacity
vehicle_capacity.description: How much cargo can the vehicle carry (units, e.g. cubic meters)

vehicle_max_cargo_weight.title: Vehicle Maximum Cargo Weight
vehicle_max_cargo_weight.description: Maximum cargo weight a vehicle can cary

vehicle_max_cargo_volume.title: Vehicle Maximum Cargo Volume
vehicle_max_cargo_volume.description: Maximum cargo volume a vehicle can cary

vehicle_max_distance_mi.title: Vehicle Maximum Distance (mi)
vehicle_max_distance_mi.description: Maximum distance for a single vehicle in this route (always in miles)

subtour_max_revenue.title: Subtour Max Revenue
subtour_max_revenue.description: Maximum allowed revenue from a subtour

distance_unit.title: Distance Unit
distance_unit.description: The distance measurement unit for the route

travel_mode.title: Travel Mode
travel_mode.description: The mode of travel that the directions should be optimized for

avoid.title: Avoid
avoid.description: Options which let the user choose which road obstacles to avoid. This has no impact on route sequencing

avoidance_zones.title: Avoidance Zones
avoidance_zones.description: Array of the Avoidance zones IDs

vehicle_id.title: Vehicle ID
vehicle_id.description: The unique internal id of a vehicle

driver_id.title: Driver ID
driver_id.description: The unique internal id of a driver

dev_lat.title: Device Latitude
dev_lat.description: The latitude location of where a mobile device was located when it made a request to create the route.

dev_lng.title: Device Longitude
dev_lng.description: The longitude location of where a mobile device was located when it made a request to create the route

route_max_duration.title: Route Maximum Duration
route_max_duration.description: How many seconds a route can last at most. Default is 24 hours = 86400 seconds

target_duration.title: Target Duration
target_duration.description: The parameter specifies fine-tuning of an optimization process by route duration.

target_distance.title: Target Distance
target_distance.description: The parameter specifies fine-tuning of an optimization process by route distance.

target_wait_by_tail_size.title: Target Wait By Tail Size
target_wait_by_tail_size.description: The parameter specifies fine-tuning of an optimization process by waiting time.

route_email.title: Route Email
route_email.description: Addresses where this route was shared after completion

algorithm_type.title: Algorithm Type
algorithm_type.description: The algorithm to be used: 1 = TSP, 2 = VRP, 3 = CVRP_TW_SD, 4 = CVRP_TW_MD, 5 = TSP_TW, 6 = TSP_TW_CR, 7 = BBCVRP, 9 = ADVANCED_CVRP_TW,100 = ALG_NONE, 101 = ALG_LEGACY_DISTRIBUTED

member_id.title: Member ID
member_id.description: User ID who is assigned to the route

ip.title: IP
ip.description: IP Address in decimal form of user who created the route

parts.title: Parts
parts.description: Legacy feature which permits a user to request an example number of optimized routes

device_id.title: Device ID
device_id.description: 32 Character MD5 String ID of the device that was used to plan this route

device_type.title: Device Type
device_type.description: The type of the device that is creating this route

first_drive_then_wait_between_stops.title: First Drive Then Wait Between Stops
first_drive_then_wait_between_stops.description: First drive then wait between stops

trailer_weight_t.title: Trailer Weight (t)
trailer_weight_t.description: If has_trailer = true, specifies the weight of the trailer (required)

limited_weight_t.title: Limited Weight (t)
limited_weight_t.description: If travel_mode = 'Trucking', specifies the truck weight (required)

weight_per_axle_t.title: Weight per Axle (t)
weight_per_axle_t.description: If travel_mode = 'Trucking', specifies the weight per axle (required)

truck_height.title: Truck Height
truck_height.description: If travel_mode = 'Trucking', specifies the truck height (required)

truck_width.title: Truck Width
truck_width.description: If travel_mode = 'Trucking', specifies the truck width (required)

truck_length.title: Truck Length
truck_length.description: If travel_mode = 'Trucking', specifies the truck length (required)

truck_hazardous_goods.title: Truck Hazardous Goods
truck_hazardous_goods.description: Comma-delimited list of the truck hazardous goods

truck_lcv.title: Truck LCV
truck_lcv.description: Truck of the type Long Combination Vehicle

truck_weight.title: Truck Weight
truck_weight.description: If travel_mode = 'Trucking', specifies the truck weight (required)

min_tour_size.title: Minimum Tour Size
min_tour_size.description: Must be > 0; the minimum number of stops allowed in a subtour. null means there is no minimum

max_tour_size.title: Maximum Tour Size
max_tour_size.description: Must be > 0; the maximum number of stops allowed in a subtour. null means there is no maximum

optimization_quality.title: Optimization Quality
optimization_quality.description: there are 3 types of optimization qualities that are optimizations goals (1 - Generate Optimized Routes As Quickly as Possible, 2 - Generate Routes That Look Better On A Map, 3 - Generate The Shortest And Quickest Possible Routes)

uturn.title: uturn
uturn.description: Available with:1 = UTURN_DEPART_SHORTEST (Allows U-turns), 2 = UTURN_DEPART_TO_RIGHT (Forbids U-turns), 3 = UTURN_DEPART_TO_LEFT (Deprecated)

leftturn.title: leftturn
leftturn.description: Available with: 1 = LEFTTURN_ALLOW, 2 = LEFTTURN_FORBID, 3 = LEFTTURN_MULTIAPPROACH (assumes points are intersections and visits them from all sides. Ignores uturn and leftturn constraints.)

rightturn.title: rightturn
rightturn.description: Available with: 1 = RIGHTTURN_ALLOW, 2 = RIGHTTURN_FORBID, 3 = RIGHTTURN_MULTIAPPROACH (assumes points are intersections and visits them from all sides. Ignores uturn and leftturn constraints.)

optimization_engine.title: Optimization Engine
optimization_engine.description: The parameter shows what solver engine system use for build optimization routes 1 RVRP, 2 NVRP (default).

ignore_tw.title: Ignore Time Windows
ignore_tw.description: If true, the address time windows ignored.

time.title: Time
time.description: Service time at a route destination (address)

address_stop_type.title: AddressStopType
address_stop_type.description: The type of stop that this is (DELIVERY,PICKUP,BREAK,MEETUP,SERVICE,VISIT,DRIVEBY)

is_dynamic_start_time.title: Is Dynamic Start Time
is_dynamic_start_time.description: If true, the start time is dynamic.

max_capacity.title: Maximum Vehicle Capacity
max_capacity.description: How much total cargo can be transported per route (units, e.g. cubic meters).

members_count.title: Members Count
members_count.description: Legacy feature which permits a user to request an example number of optimized routes.

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: The driver tags specified in a team member's custom data. ((e.g. 'driver skills': ['Class A CDL', 'Class B CDL', 'Forklift', 'Skid Steer Loader', 'Independent Contractor''])
